btrplace.model

Interface Mapping

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMapping, SubMapping

    public interface Mapping
extends Cloneable
    A mapping denotes the current state and placement of VMs and nodes. Elements in a mapping must be created for ElementBuilder.newVM() and ElementBuilder.newNode()
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

    • Method Detail

      • addRunningVM

        boolean addRunningVM(VM vm,
                     Node node)
        Set a VM running on a node. The node must already be online. If the VM is already in a other location or state in the mapping, its state is updated
        Parameters:
        vm - the VM
        node - the node that will host the VM. The node must already be considered as online.
        Returns:
        true iff the VM is assigned on the node.

      • addSleepingVM

        boolean addSleepingVM(VM vm,
                      Node node)
        Set a VM sleeping on a node. If the VM is already in a other location or state in the mapping, its state is updated
        Parameters:
        vm - the VM
        node - the node that will host the VM. The node must already be considered as online.
        Returns:
        false iff the hosting node is offline or unknown

      • addReadyVM

        boolean addReadyVM(VM vm)
        Set a VM ready for being running. If the VM is already in a other location or state in the mapping, its state is updated
        Parameters:
        vm - the VM
        Returns:
        true iff the VM is now in the ready state

      • remove

        boolean remove(VM vm)
        Remove a VM.
        Parameters:
        vm - the VM to remove.
        Returns:
        true iff the VM was in the mapping and has been removed

      • remove

        boolean remove(Node n)
        Remove a node. The node must not host any VMs.
        Parameters:
        n - the node.
        Returns:
        true if the node was in the mapping and is removed. false otherwise

      • getOnlineNodes

        Set<Node> getOnlineNodes()
        Get the online nodes.
        Returns:
        a set of nodes, may be empty

      • addOnlineNode

        boolean addOnlineNode(Node node)
        Set a node online. If the node is already in the mapping but in an another state, it is updated.
        Parameters:
        node - the node.
        Returns:
        true iff the node is now in the online state

      • addOfflineNode

        boolean addOfflineNode(Node node)
        Set a node offline. If the node is already in the mapping but in an another state, it is updated. The node must not host any VMs
        Parameters:
        node - the node
        Returns:
        true if the node is offline. false otherwise

      • getOfflineNodes

        Set<Node> getOfflineNodes()
        Get the offline nodes..
        Returns:
        a set of nodes, may be empty

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getVMLocation

        Node getVMLocation(VM vm)
        Get the location of a running or a sleeping VM.
        Parameters:
        vm - the VM.
        Returns:
        the node hosting the VM. null is the VM is not in the sleeping state nor the running state
